statements.statement:
SELECT '0' CHK, CE_MAS.SALES_NO, (SELECT VEND_MAS.VEND_NM_EN FROM TB_VEND_MASTER VEND_MAS WHERE VEND_MAS.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND VEND_MAS.VEND_CD = CE_MAS.CUSTOMER_CD) CUSTOMER, CE_MAS.CUSTOMER_CD, (SELECT VEND_MAS.VEND_NM_EN FROM TB_VEND_MASTER VEND_MAS WHERE VEND_MAS.COMPANY_CD = 'GA00' AND VEND_MAS.VEND_CD = CE_MAS.DELIVERY_CD) DELIVERY, CE_MAS.DELIVERY_CD, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CE_MAS.SALES_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') SALES_DATE, CE_MAS.GRAND_TOTAL_QTY, CE_MAS.CURRENCY_CD, CE_MAS.GRAND_TOTAL_AMT, CE_MAS.PAY_TERM, LGIUSF.F_GETCOMMNAME('COMM',${companyCd},${lang},'2318',CE_MAS.ORDER_STATUS) ORDER_STATUS_NM, CE_MAS.ORDER_STATUS, CE_MAS.CREDIT_MSG, CE_MAS.STATUS, CE_MAS.BL_IF_DOC_SEQ, (SELECT ATTR10 FROM LGIUSF.TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL COMM WHERE COMM.COMPANY_CD = CE_MAS.COMPANY_CD AND GROUP_CD = '2001' AND DETAIL_CD = CE_MAS.DEPT_CD) GROUP_CD, CE_MAS.SAP_SEQ, CE_MAS.SAP_RTN_MSG, CE_MAS.TRANS_DATE, PT.ATTR2 ADDR1, PT.ATTR3 ADDR2, PT.ATTR4 ADDR3, PT.ATTR5 ADDR4, PT.ATTR6 ADDR5, PT.ATTR7 ADDR6, PD.ATTR2 PUR_DEPT1, PD.ATTR3 PUR_DEPT2, PD.ATTR4 PUR_DEPT3, PD.ATTR5 PUR_DEPT4, PD.ATTR6 PUR_DEPT5, PD.ATTR7 PUR_DEPT6 FROM TB_CEMENT_SALES_MASTER CE_MAS, LGIUSF.TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL PD, LGIUSF.TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL PT WHERE 1 = 1 AND CE_MAS.COMPANY_CD = PD.COMPANY_CD AND CE_MAS.DEPT_CD = PD.DETAIL_CD AND CE_MAS.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND PD.GROUP_CD = '2001' AND PD.COMPANY_CD = PT.COMPANY_CD AND PD.COMPANY_CD = PT.DETAIL_CD AND PT.GROUP_CD = '2006' AND CE_MAS.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND CE_MAS.SALES_DATE >= REPLACE(${salesDateFrom}, '/', '') AND CE_MAS.SALES_DATE <= REPLACE(${salesDateTo}, '/', '') AND ORIGINAL_SALES_NO IS NULL {#1} {#2} {#3}
AND CE_MAS.CUSTOMER_CD LIKE '%'||${vendorCd}||'%'
AND CE_MAS.ORDER_STATUS LIKE '%'||${orderStatus}||'%'
AND CE_MAS.ORDER_STATUS IN ('0','1','2','9')

SELECT CE_DET.MATER_CD, (SELECT MAT_INF.MATER_NM_EN FROM TB_MATER_INFO MAT_INF WHERE MAT_INF.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND MAT_INF.MATER_CD = CE_DET.MATER_CD AND MAT_INF.USEYN = 'Y') MATER_NM, CE_DET.CURRENT_QTY, CE_DET.SALES_QTY, CE_DET.UNIT_PRICE, CE_DET.SALES_AMT, CE_DET.VAT_CD, CE_DET.VAT_AMT, CE_DET.TOTAL_AMT, CE_DET.SALES_NO, CE_DET.UNIT, CE_DET.STOR_LOCT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CE_DET.SALES_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') SALES_DATE, CE_DET.SALES_ITEM_SEQ FROM TB_CEMENT_SALES_DETAIL CE_DET WHERE CE_DET.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND CE_DET.SALES_DATE = REPLACE(${salesDate}, '/', '') AND CE_DET.SALES_NO = ${salesNo}

SELECT 'SA' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(${salesDate},'/',''), 3, 6) || LPAD(TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(SALES_NO,9,3)),0))+1,3,0) AS SALES_NO FROM TB_CEMENT_SALES_MASTER WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SALES_DATE = REPLACE(${salesDate},'/','')

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_SALES_MASTER SET PERNR = ${userId}, CUSTOMER_CD = ${customerCd}, CURRENCY_CD = ${currencyCd}, STOR_LOCT = '', DELIVERY_CD = ${deliveryCd}, PLANT_CD = 'GA10', GRAND_TOTAL_AMT = ${grandTotalAmt}, GRAND_TOTAL_QTY = ${grandTotalQty}, PAY_TERM = ${payTerm}, ORDER_STATUS = ${orderStatus}, CREDIT_MSG = ${creditMsg}, MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SALES_DATE = REPLACE(${salesDate},'/','') AND SALES_NO = ${salesNo}

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_SALES_DETAIL SET MATER_CD = ${materCd}, TOTAL_AMT = ${totalAmt}, UNIT_PRICE = ${unitPrice}, SALES_QTY = ${salesQty}, SALES_AMT = ${salesAmt}, VAT_CD = ${vatCd}, VAT_AMT = ${vatAmt}, STOR_LOCT = ${storLoct}, MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SALES_DATE = REPLACE(${salesDate},'/','') AND SALES_NO = ${salesNo} AND SALES_ITEM_SEQ = ${salesItemSeq}

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_SALES_MASTER SET ORDER_STATUS = '2', MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SALES_DATE = REPLACE(${salesDate},'/','') AND SALES_NO = ${salesNo} AND ORDER_STATUS = '1'

SELECT cd.detail_cd code, decode(${lang},'kr',cd.detail_cd_nm_kr, 'en',cd.detail_cd_nm_en, cd.detail_cd_nm_lo) name, TO_NUMBER(sort) sort FROM lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_master cm, lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail cd WHERE cm.company_cd = cd.company_cd AND cm.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND cm.group_cd = cd.group_cd AND cm.useyn = 'Y' AND cd.group_cd = '2007' AND cd.useyn = 'Y' AND cd.detail_cd LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY SORT

SELECT cd.detail_cd code, decode(${lang},'kr',cd.detail_cd_nm_kr, 'en',cd.detail_cd_nm_en, cd.detail_cd_nm_lo) name, TO_NUMBER(sort) sort FROM lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_master cm, lgiusf.tb_comm_cd_detail cd WHERE cm.company_cd = cd.company_cd AND cm.group_cd = cd.group_cd AND cm.useyn = 'Y' AND cd.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND cd.group_cd = ${groupCd} AND cd.detail_cd IN ('7900','7920') AND cd.useyn = 'Y' ORDER BY cd.detail_cd desc

SELECT COMPANY_CD ,MATER_CD ,ATTR1 MODEL_NM ,ATTR2 ACTV_CD ,F_GETUNITPRICE(${companyCd}, DECODE(BLOCK_CD,'CP','CP','KE','KE',SUBSTR(YEAR_CD,2,2)), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(${salesDate},'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(${salesDate},'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM')) UNIT_PRICE FROM tb_mater_info WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND MATER_TYPE = ${materType} AND USEYN = 'Y'

SELECT '-- Total --' AS name ,'' AS code ,0 sort FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT a.vend_nm_en code ,a.vend_cd name ,1 sort FROM (SELECT vend_mas.vend_nm_en ,vend_mas.vend_cd FROM tb_vend_master vend_mas WHERE vend_mas.company_cd = ${companyCd}) a, (SELECT ce_mas.customer_cd FROM tb_cement_sales_master ce_mas WHERE ce_mas.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND ce_mas.original_sales_no IS NULL GROUP BY ce_mas.customer_cd) b WHERE a.vend_cd = b.customer_cd ORDER BY sort, name

SELECT ce_mas.condition_value ,ce_mas.condition_vat_amt ,ce_mas.condition_vat_cd ,ce_mas.condition_total_amt FROM tb_cement_sales_master ce_mas WHERE ce_mas.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND ce_mas.sales_date = replace(${salesDate},'/','') AND ce_mas.sales_no = ${salesNo} AND original_sales_no IS NOT NULL

UPDATE tb_cement_sales_master SET pernr = ${userId}, memo_type = ${memoType}, doc_date = replace(${docDate},'/',''), posting_date = replace(${postingDate},'/',''), condition_value = ${conditionValue}, condition_vat_amt = ${conditionVatAmt}, condition_vat_cd = ${conditionVatCd}, condition_total_amt = ${conditionTotalAmt}, status = '0', sap_rtn_msg = '', modid = ${userId}, moddate = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'), modtime = to_Char(sysdate,'hh24miss') WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND sales_date = replace(${salesDate},'/','') AND sales_no = ${salesNo} AND original_sales_no IS NOT NULL

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY ce_mas.COMPANY_CD, ce_mas.original_sales_no) = 0 THEN 'NOT EXIST' ELSE 'EXIST' END AS check_original_sales_no , ce_mas.original_sales_no FROM tb_cement_sales_master ce_mas WHERE ce_mas.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND ce_mas.original_sales_no = ${originalSalesNo}

UPDATE tb_cement_sales_master set status = '8', modid = ${userId}, moddate = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'), modtime = to_Char(sysdate,'hh24miss'), trans_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND sales_date = replace(${salesDate},'/','') AND sales_no = ${salesNo} AND original_sales_no IS NULL

select ce_det.company_cd ,ce_det.dept_cd ,ce_det.sales_date delivery_date ,ce_det.sales_no ,ce_det.sales_item_seq item_seq ,ce_det.mater_cd ,ce_det.sales_type ,ce_det.unit ,ce_det.stor_loct ,'GA10' plant_cd ,ce_det.total_amt ,ce_det.unit_price ,ce_det.current_qty ,ce_det.sales_qty div_sales_weight ,ce_det.sales_amt div_sales_amt ,ce_det.vat_cd ,ce_det.vat_amt tax_amt ,ce_det.attr1 ,ce_det.attr2 ,ce_det.attr3 ,ce_det.attr4 ,ce_det.attr5 ,ce_det.attr6 ,ce_det.attr7 ,ce_det.attr8 ,ce_det.attr9 ,ce_det.attr10 ,ce_det.regid ,ce_det.regdate ,ce_det.regtime ,ce_det.modid ,ce_det.moddate ,ce_det.modtime ,ce_det.ifstcd ,ce_det.iferrmsg ,ce_mas.currency_cd FROM tb_cement_sales_master ce_mas, tb_cement_sales_detail ce_det WHERE ce_mas.company_cd = ce_det.company_cd AND ce_mas.dept_cd = ce_det.dept_cd AND ce_mas.sales_date = ce_det.sales_date AND ce_mas.sales_no = ce_det.sales_no AND ce_det.company_cd = ${companyCd} AND ce_det.sales_date = replace(${salesDate},'/','') AND ce_det.sales_no = ${salesNo}

UPDATE tb_cement_sales_master set sap_seq = ${sapSeq}, status = '1', sap_rtn_msg = ${returnMsg}, modid = ${userId}, moddate = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'), modtime = to_Char(sysdate,'hh24miss'), ifstcd = 'Y' WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND sales_date = replace(${salesDate},'/','') AND sales_no = ${salesNo} AND original_sales_no IS NULL

UPDATE tb_cement_sales_master set status = '8', modid = ${userId}, moddate = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'), modtime = to_Char(sysdate,'hh24miss'), trans_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND sales_date = replace(${salesDate},'/','') AND sales_no = ${salesNo} AND original_sales_no IS NOT NULL

UPDATE tb_cement_sales_master set sap_seq = ${sapSeq}, status = '1', sap_rtn_msg = ${returnMsg}, modid = ${userId}, moddate = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'), modtime = to_Char(sysdate,'hh24miss'), ifstcd = 'Y' WHERE company_cd = ${companyCd} AND sales_date = replace(${salesDate},'/','') AND sales_no = ${salesNo} AND original_sales_no IS NOT NULL
